hotelRoom.description: Our standard rooms are comfortable and warm.
Our deluxe single rooms come with a kingsized single bed, a larger TV, faster WIFI and an open phone line. Toll calls aren't included.
Our standard rooms are comfortable and warm.
Our deluxe single rooms come with two kingsized single beds, more space in the lounge, a larger TV, faster WIFI and an open phone line. Toll calls aren't included.
Our standard rooms are comfortable and warm.
Our deluxe single rooms come with three kingsized single beds, more space in the lounge, a larger TV, faster WIFI and an open phone line.
Our standard rooms are comfortable and warm.
Our deluxe Queen rooms actually come with a kingsized single bed, more space in the lounge, a larger TV, a stereo, faster WIFI and an open phone line.
Our standard rooms are comfortable and warm.
Our deluxe single rooms come with kingsized beds, more space in the lounge, a larger TV, faster WIFI, an open phone line, a balcony and a BBQ.
Our standard rooms are comfortable and warm.
Our deluxe single rooms come with kingsized beds, more space in the lounge, a larger TV, faster WIFI, an outside patio, a bbq, air conditioning and an open phone line.
